reviews.title: Superb Hotel
A&EM HOTEL, HO CHI MINH CITY
Cleaner bed and no mosquitos, pls!
reviews.text: Perfect location at the heart of Saigon is the only strength of this hotel. We prefer a cleaner bed and a mosquito-free room to cheesy decor. Breakfast buffet was poor, but there r plenty of good restaurants and cafe within walking distance.

This is the newest Hotel of the group A&EM. Because they want to promote this hotel we got a 30% discount (untill +/- 21 of July). Be sure to check by if the booking was ok. We arrived around 2 pm and they couldn't find our booking (which was done on their website). We were lucky the rooms we wanted were still available.
reviews.title: New A&Em in an excellent location
